A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just watched this film again and am baffled by the hate. It's a great movie! I still feel there are a lot of unanswered questions (especially with Rey and Snoke) in this new Star Wars trilogy but I'm eager to see how it all pans out in Episode 9. If that fails to deliver I may have to revisit my feelings on all of this but as of right now I feel like The Last Jedi was the best Star Wars film since Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. (My personal favorites in the series)
